text: The 1962 South Dakota gubernatorial election was held on November 6, 1962. Incumbent Republican Governor Archie M. Gubbrud defeated Democratic nominee Ralph Herseth with 56.10% of the vote. ==Primary elections== Primary elections were held on June 5, 1962. ===Democratic primary=== ====Candidates==== *Ralph Herseth, former Governor ====Results==== ===Republican primary=== ====Candidates==== *Archie M. Gubbrud, incumbent Governor ====Results==== ==General election== ===Candidates=== *Ralph Herseth, Democratic *Archie M. Gubbrud, Republican ===Results=== ==References== ==Bibliography== * * 1962 South Dakota Gubernatorial Category:November 1962 events
title: 1962 South Dakota gubernatorial election
